summary: Encapsulates yearly time‑series of vegetation‑related parameters (soil cover, leaf area index, interception capacity, various evaporation and ponding factors) for each vegetation type, indexed by vegetation index and day of year, and renders them into the fact_svat.inp file required by the hydrological model when the WOFOST crop model is not used.
business_intent: Supply the necessary crop‑specific interception, evaporation and ponding coefficients to support water‑balance calculations in the absence of the WOFOST model, ensuring accurate representation of vegetation effects on hydrology.
